code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/Signup.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:"",email:""});const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSignup=()=>{if(!formData.name.trim()||!formData.email.trim()){alert("Please fill in all fields.");return;}fetch("http://localhost:5001/signup",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(formData)}).then(res=>{if(!res.ok){throw new Error("Failed to register user.");}return res.json();}).then(data=>{if(data.message==="User registered successfully!"){alert("Signup successful!
